name: Brandon Trumble
summary: Experienced Mobile Developer with 10+ years designing and delivering high-performance Android and iOS applications. Expert in native (Swift, Kotlin) and cross-platform (React Native, Flutter) development, with a strong foundation in web and backend technologies (JavaScript, TypeScript, Node.js). Proven track record building secure, scalable apps for finance, education, and enterprise domains, optimizing performance, CI/CD pipelines, and user experiences. Delivered apps with [insert metric if known, e.g., 1M+ downloads or 99% crash-free rate].

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer
bullets: Architected and delivered complex cross-platform apps for Android and iOS using React Native and Flutter, integrating with existing web-based backend services.
Developed native mobile features with Swift (iOS) and Kotlin (Android), including offline data caching, background sync, push notifications, and biometric authentication.
Built robust API integrations with REST and GraphQL, supporting secure authentication and optimized data transfer.
Optimized mobile performance using profiling tools, memory management, and bundle size reduction, improving app responsiveness and load times.
Implemented unit, integration, and end-to-end tests to ensure app stability, maintainability, and smooth app store approvals.
Automated mobile CI/CD pipelines using Fastlane and GitHub Actions, enabling multi-environment builds and zero-downtime releases.
Mentored junior developers in mobile best practices, architecture patterns, and cross-platform development strategies.

experience.title: Software Engineer
bullets: Built cross-platform mobile apps using React Native, connecting to enterprise backend services for data-intensive operations.
Developed native Android features using Kotlin and integrated Firebase services including Analytics, Crashlytics, and Cloud Messaging.
Designed responsive and adaptive mobile UI using Material Design and platform-specific guidelines.
Maintained web dashboards supporting mobile apps using React, Node.js, and PostgreSQL.
Conducted automated and manual testing to ensure app stability across multiple devices and OS versions.

experience.title: Software Engineer
bullets: Developed and maintained enterprise-grade education management systems using C# .NET and VB.NET, applying solid OOP principles to improve code maintainability, reusability, and long-term scalability.
Built and optimized SQL Server databases and complex T-SQL queries, stored procedures, and indexes to support high-volume student, financial, and administrative data processing.
Contributed to mobile application development using Apache Cordova and Ionic, delivering cross-platform mobile solutions used by school administrators and educators.
Implemented dynamic, responsive user interfaces with Angular, HTML, CSS, improving usability and consistency across desktop and mobile platforms.
Participated in full SDLC activities, including requirements analysis, system design, development, testing, deployment, and post-release support in a regulated education environment.
Collaborated closely with product managers, QA engineers, and business analysts to translate district-level requirements into reliable technical solutions.
Diagnosed and resolved production issues, performance bottlenecks, and data inconsistencies, improving system stability and reducing support turnaround time.

education.degree: Bachelor’s degree in Computer and Information Science
